item.title: Web Application testing – install Siege on Linux (or Mac OSx)
item.description: Siegeis a great tool for performance and load testing your web application. I’ve been using it for the past 6 months to test WordPress websites along with other web apps that we’ve been building. Use it to straighten out any kinks with applications like WordPress, learn if you’re server and database is flakey or prove that your CDN is super. Siege testing vs Apache Benchmark If you’ve used Apache Benchmark in Mac OSx or Linux then you’ll already have an idea what Siege can do.
